monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Anti Curse
skills.description: Aura: All Debuffs are 20% less effective on Monsters in your party.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Bite
skills.description: 2 x 170% (340%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 2 x (50 + 40% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 3 x (50 + 30% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 4 x (75 + 25% Attack)

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Boulder Toss
skills.description: 1 x 500% physical damage (earth) ignores 50% of the target's Defense damage reduction value, cannot be dodged

skills.name: Buff Catalyst
skills.description: Buffs are 20% more effective on this Monster.

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Crit Chance Focus
skills.description: Critical Chance values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Focus
skills.description: Critical Damage values from equipment increased by 50%.

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Buffs
skills.description: When applying a Buff, there is a chance to also apply 2 Charge stacks, equal to this Monster's Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 10% of own Critical Damage value.

skills.name: Critical Essence
skills.description: Neutral attacks have 10% increased Critical Chance.

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Critical Poison
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Curse Transfusion
skills.description: For each Debuff this Monster has, it deals 4% increased Damage and gains 4% Damage Reduction.

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.description: 8 x 75% (600%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether and Blind.

skills.name: Darken
skills.description: Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a stack of Blind. (Stacks don't count as Debuffs)

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Exposed
skills.description: Aura: Your Monsters deal 15% more damage when attacking an enemy with Blind stacks.

skills.name: Extra Channel
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party gains a non-Channel Buff, 15% chance they also gain Channel.

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Gemstone Barrage
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies Applies Regeneration (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Heroic Defense
skills.description: Reduces damage taken by 2% for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Multi Channel
skills.description: Aura: Channel (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Neutral Resistance
skills.description: Neutral damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Shadow Grasp
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Grasp Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm
skills.description: 2 x 65% (130%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 80% (160%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 110% (220%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Shadow Storm Lvl 4
skills.description: 2 x 145% (290%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Blind.

skills.name: Situational Support
skills.description: When this Monster uses a non-damaging action for the first time in combat, apply a random Buff on all allies and shield them by 20% of their Max Health.

skills.name: Sorcery
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Soul Beam
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Soul Beam Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (earth) applies Regeneration (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Stone Rain
skills.description: 3 x 65% (195%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Stone Rain Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) physical damage (earth)

skills.name: Wizardry
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Sorcery (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Wizardry Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Sorcery & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

drops.name: Totem
drops.description: Attack +10 Magic +10 Health +100 Shield self for 200 at the start of combat
